TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Berry and Battle Dr., 05-xx-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Berry and Battle to Austin, May 1,1825. Bill for carpentering.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1085

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Berry and Battle to Austin, May 1,1825. Bill for carpentering.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p* *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Berry */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Battle */person_mentioned*Dr*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="02-xx-1825">Feby*/date_mentioned*. Making a desk for the *location_mentioned*Office*/location_mentioned*, in trade____________________ $50*/p**p*repairs on the *location_mentioned*new house*/location_mentioned*-__________________ 12*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="03-19-1825">March 19*/date_mentioned* Making a rough Door to the *location_mentioned*Office*/location_mentioned*______________________ 2. 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-xx-1825">Apl*/date_mentioned*. 12 Making a small book case_______________________________ 10*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="05-xx-1825">May*/date_mentioned*, 1 Bee payment in full___________________________________ $74. 50*/p*
*/div1*
